name: Pristine Prayers
description: Dahlia's outfit. Rather than the solemn, constricting robes of the church, the lively Deacon Dahlia prefers light clothing. Indeed, piety is a quality favored by the gods, but Barbatos is not the God of Winds and Freedom for naught. Dahlia is sure that his fashion sense would earn the beneficent Anemo Archon's approval!
